channel.title: Attack bug
channel.description:
When it follows and follows until you click away or catch them, I try'd a few ways and none of them seem to work.
I have commented out,
[code]affectedPlayer.resetAll();[/code]
But it still does not fix, Any ideas?
Thanks.

item.title: Attack bug
item.dc:creator: @z21 z2
item.description:
@z21 wrote:

[quote=“Crooks, post:4, topic:331386”]I think they just mean that you only need to comment out this…

// player.setFollowing(affectedMob);

This is right, that line makes it so when you click attack, it actually follows the player also. When removing the line, when you click attack it should only follow it until the coords which the player was on when you attempted to attack, then it SHOULD stop at that point instead of following.

Read full topic

item.title: Attack bug
item.dc:creator: @Crooks Crooks
item.description:

item.title: Attack bug
item.dc:creator: @Lets_PK Lets PK
item.description:
@Lets_PK wrote:

I comment out this,

owner.resetAll(); owner.setStatus(Action.FIGHTING_MOB); if(affectedMob instanceof Player) { Player affectedPlayer = (Player)affectedMob; owner.setSkulledOn(affectedPlayer); // affectedPlayer.resetAll();// affectedPlayer.setStatus(Action.FIGHTING_MOB); affectedPlayer.getActionSender().sendMessage("You are under attack!"); } affectedMob.resetPath();

But its still not working? Am i doing something wrong?

Thanks for looking.

Read full topic
